DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether different video laryngoscopes facilitate intubation in an manikin with immobilized cervical spine compared with standard laryngoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Different Video Laryngoscopes in a Manikin With Immobilized Cervical Spine
DOC.criteria: anaesthesiologist experienced in tracheal intubation missing experience in tracheal intubation missing informed consent
